statements: SELECT * FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT timestamp, location FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, timestamp, behavior_type FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM consumer_behavior_data;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, location, behavior_type FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location, behavior_type FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, behavior_type FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM consumer_behavior_data;
SELECT device_id, location FROM consumer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, location FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type='purchase';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, effectiveness_score FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE location='New York' AND behavior_type='click';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND behavior_type = 'Click'
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'Purchase' AND location LIKE '%CA%'
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, effectiveness_score FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data JOIN marketing_strategies ON customer_behavior_data.user_id = marketing_strategies.strategy_id
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone' ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Millennials';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE usage_hours BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'senior citizens';
SELECT customer_id, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 25 AND income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM consumer_data LIMIT 10
SELECT consumer_id, event_type, location FROM consumer_data WHERE device_id = 123
SELECT consumer_id, event_timestamp FROM consumer_data ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT location FROM consumer_data WHERE event_type = 'click'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM consumer_data
SELECT consumer_id, event_timestamp, location FROM consumer_data WHERE event_type = 'click' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM consumer_data WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY consumer_id ASC
SELECT consumer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM consumer_data WHERE event_type = 'view' GROUP BY consumer_id HAVING total_events > 5 ORDER BY total_events DESC
SELECT * FROM consumer_data WHERE location = 'California' OR location = 'New York' ORDER BY consumer_id, event_timestamp
SELECT consumer_id, MAX(event_timestamp) AS latest_event FROM consumer_data GROUP BY consumer_id ORDER BY latest_event DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_id, product_id, amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 2;
SELECT * FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
